movies.title: Femrat
movies.plot: An albanian farce/comedy about women and men and their problems
movies.simplePlot: An albanian farce/comedy about women and men and their problems

biography.bio: Ermal Mamaqi is an actor, known for Femrat (2013), Alive! (2009) and Skanderbeg (2017).
biography.name: Ermal Mamaqi

biography.bio: Born in Tirana, Albania, Enxhi studied Spanish in high school and did some modeling before being discovered by director Rudina Vojvoda to star as the lead female actor in the highly successful comedy, "Femrat". Later she embarks in a Tv career while in 2015 stars in Bloodlands (out in 2017), an Australian thriller directed by Steven Kastrissios. In 2015 she becomes the image of Dabur cosmetic products. "Bunker" from Kast Hasa is her next project, while in 2017 she stars in the movie "World Between Waters".
biography.name: Enxhi Cuku

biography.bio: Zamira Kita is an actress, known for Femrat (2013), Komuna e Parisit (2010) and Njerëz në rrymë (1989).
biography.name: Zamira Kita

biography.bio: Robert Aliaj Dragot, not only began as a painter, but his painting was also the point of departure for all the other activities he manifested. In the end of 90's, after a long career as a pop star singer, Robert Aliaj DRAGOT nearly stopped with music to come back to his first concern as an art painter. Dragot's work is figurative and makes extensive use of techniques from photography, television and film. Subjects of his paintings range usually from politics in Albania, to the very banal. For a while he abandoned painting completely to make shorts and video's. Now many years later in Brussels, he is focused especially to a multi-medial research, experimenting with photography, moving images, animations, sounds and painting itself, without loosing the picturesque quality. His attention divides himself between a critical curiosity of the artistic scene in Europe and a renewed interest for the fast shock therapeutic change, which the Albanian state underwent.
biography.name: Robert Aliaj
